name: Vermicious Assumption
components: V, S, M (a handful of worms)
text: You call a single vermlek demon (Lords of Chaos 54) to invade and inhabit the body of the target corpse, taking on its likeness. The vermlek can remain on the Material Plane indefinitely as long as it has a body to inhabit; however, if it remains outside of a host for more than 1 minute, it’s banished back to the Abyss. The vermlek’s initial attitude towards you is friendly, but you must succeed at an opposed Charisma check to convince it to obey your commands, similar to a charmed creature. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on this Charisma check if you offer it a fresh humanoid corpse to inhabit.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一把蠕虫）
target_zh: 一个中体型类人生物的尸体
text_zh:
你召唤单独一只虫裂魔（《混沌诸王54页》）入侵并栖居在目标尸体的身体中，装出它的样子。虫裂魔可以无限期地停留在物质位面，只要它有一个身体可以栖居；然而，如果它离开宿主超过1分钟，它就会被放逐回深渊。虫裂魔对你的初始态度是友善的，但你必须成功通过一次魅力对抗检定才能说服它服从你的命令，类似于一个被魅惑的生物。如果你提供一具新鲜的类人生物尸体供其栖居，你会在该魅力检定上获得+2环境加值。

（译注：又是虫裂魔，还有这个“Assumption”译作“替身”（就是这个意思！）是参考了间谍大师的10级大招，自己想是绝对想不出来的）
